title: Freedmen's Bureau Records: W. Storer How to Orlando Brown, January 9, 1866
summary: How summarizes conditions throughout the Sixth Sub-District. In reference to Augusta County, he mentions a riot on Christmas day, and the intransigence of the white community.
keywords: Administration/Bureaucracy, Aid/Relief, Community Values/Local Behavior, Economy, Education, Employment/Labor, Legal System, Military Authority, Property, Slavery, Race Relations, American Civil War
